feed.title: Category: bootstrap | Maciej Kus is not a Figure Skater

entry.title: asset allocation bootstrap
entry.content: Another bootstrap project is the asset allocation calculator I created. The JavaScript is mostly simple math and there’s some jQuery to create and remove fields. Thanks to bootstrap the page is responsive, works well across browsers and looks pretty.

entry.title: bootstrap is the best
entry.content: I took a quick little Bootstrap course online through edx. I then made a simple little band website using Bootstrap here: We are the Best. It is a fan site for the punk rock band in the Swedish film We are the Best. Practice Practice Practice, it’s all one can do to learn.
